modName: Ossuarium Hair Clipping Fix for Human Females
summary: Fixes all human female hairs to stop clipping through most open faced helmets.
descriptionHtml:
By Ossuarium
Content owned by Bethesda Softworks
Content only permissable to be released on the Nexus network

============ v1.0 | 03 0345Z JUL 2013 =============

Fixes all human female hairs to stop clipping through helmets.

All female hairs tested with iron helm, hide helm, ancient nord helm, dragonscale helm.

Dragonplate Helm, Jagged Crown, Helm of Yngol are not fixed because those armor meshes are broken.

Another mod fixes the Dragonplate Helm mesh issue, no Jagged Crown fix as of yet, dirty fix for Helm of Yngol.

This mod was accomplished my swapping hairlines and reducing the scale of the hairstyles to flatten them out.

Vanilla hairstyles only. Human female hairstyles only.

Does not affect males of any race, elven females, orcish females, argonian females, khajiit females.
author: Ossuarium
